item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded: [gravityform id=1 title=false description=true]

item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded:
This page uses Genesis Column Classes to display two, three and four columns of text. The StudioPress developer site has more information on how to use these classes. Style your content with one click Check out how great these blockquotes look! Just click a button when editing Posts or Pages to make them pop like this call-out. Paying attention to details like this when adding your content helps make the type a part of the User Experience.
About Genesis The Genesis Theme Framework is built on a simple parent theme, but can be extended with child themes like this one. Each child theme comes with a unique look, homepage and functions file. We’ve also built custom widgets that will make adding content much easier.
About The Designer Creativity Included makes Genesis child themes that cater to a more feminine audience. Chris Ford, the creative director, infuses every theme she designs with a signature attention to detail that shine through in subtle graphic details and well-crafted typography.
No-fuss Typekit Integration You will need a Personal Typekit plan priced at $24.95/year to use the demo fonts. The theme works perfectly well without Typekit—but we definitely think it adds that extra punch and personality to a site.
Time Saving Shortcodes Custom shortcodes make it easy to add galleries, copyright information, supply lists and featured images. Don’t struggle with styling…you want to create art, not code websites!
Portfolio Page Template A grid-style portfolio page template makes it quick and easy to show off your photography, layouts, jewelry designs, amigurumi creations—whatever your creative mind comes up with!
Illustrations The demo illustrations are not included with this theme. If you like them and would like to purchase them please visit iStockphoto.
Icons The icons shown in the demo are part of the open source Function icon set, and are included in the Family Tree theme.
Typefaces The typefaces used in the Family Tree child theme include Arvo, Bree Web and Fertigo Pro Script. They are available in the Personal plan at Typekit.com.
Plug-ins The demo uses the Gravity Forms and the Ad-minister plug-ins. Gravity Forms is a premium form framework. Ad-minister allows you to track and display ads. .

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded:
This page uses Genesis Column Classes to display two, three and four columns of text. The StudioPress developer site has more information on how to use these classes.

Style your content with one click

Check out how great these blockquotes look! Just click a button when editing Posts or Pages to make them pop like this call-out. Paying attention to details like this when adding your content helps make the type a part of the User Experience.
About Genesis
The Genesis Theme Framework is built on a simple parent theme, but can be extended with child themes like this one. Each child theme comes with a unique look, homepage and functions file. We've also built  custom widgets that will make adding content much easier.
About The Designer
Creativity Included makes Genesis child themes that cater to a more feminine audience. Chris Ford, the creative director, infuses every theme she designs with a signature attention to detail that shine through in subtle graphic details and well-crafted typography.

No-fuss Typekit Integration

You will need a Personal Typekit plan priced at $24.95/year to use the demo fonts. The theme works perfectly well without Typekit—but we definitely think it adds that extra punch and personality to a site.

Time Saving Shortcodes

Custom shortcodes make it easy to add galleries, copyright information, supply lists and featured images. Don't struggle with styling...you want to create art, not code websites!

Use Native Galleries + FancyBox

We use the native WordPress Gallery shortcode and the FancyBox plug-in to create in-post image galleries to show off your photos, crafts, or kids!

Illustrations

The demo illustrations are not included with this theme. If you like them and would like to purchase them please visit iStockphoto.

Icons

The icons shown in the demo are part of the open source Function icon set, and are included in the Family Tree theme.

Typefaces

The typefaces used in the Family Tree child theme include Arvo, Bree Web and Fertigo Pro Script. They are available in the Personal plan at Typekit.com.

Plug-ins

The demo uses the Gravity Forms and the Ad-minister plug-ins. Gravity Forms is a premium form framework. Ad-minister allows you to track and display ads. .

item.title: One Column Layouts
item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded:
Full-Width

Genesis offers its users a variety of different layout option on either a site-wide or individual Post or Page basis. The one column layout does not use a sidebar, but it does include footer widgets. A full-width layout is especially effective when showcasing large images or galleries.

View a sample full-width layout »

item.title: Two Column Layouts
item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded:
CONTENT/SIDEBAR

Genesis offers its users a variety of different layout option on either a site-wide or individual Post or Page basis. The Content/Sidebar layout option displays a sidebar on the right and the content area on the left.

View a sample content/sidebar layout »

SIDEBAR/CONTENT

Genesis offers its users a variety of different layout option on either a site-wide or individual Post or Page basis. The Sidebar/Content layout option displays a sidebar on the leftand the content area on the right.

View a sample sidebar/content layout »

item.title: Three Column Layouts
item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded:
SIDEBAR/CONTENT/SIDEBAR

Genesis offers its users a variety of different layout option on either a site-wide or individual Post or Page basis. The Sidebar/Content/Sidebar layout option displays a narrow, alternate sidebar on the left, the content area in the middle and a wider main sidebar on the right.

View a sidebar/content/sidebar layout »

CONTENT/SIDEBAR/SIDEBAR

Genesis offers its users a variety of different layout option on either a site-wide or individual Post or Page basis. The Content/Sidebar/Sidebar layout option displays the content on the left, the main, wider sidebar in the middle and a narrow alternate sidebar on the right.

View a sidebar/content/sidebar layout »

SIDEBAR/SIDEBAR/CONTENT

Genesis offers its users a variety of different layout option on either a site-wide or individual Post or Page basis. The Sidebar/Sidebar/Content layout option displays a narrow alternate sidebar on the left, a wider main sidebar in the middle and the content area on the right.

View a sidebar/sidebar/content layout »

item.title: Focus on Images
item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded:
The proof is in the pictures
Show off your photography using native WordPress galleries and the Fancy Gallery plug-in. With a simple shortcode you can have an elegant thumbnail gallery that opens a Fancybox slideshow of every image in your gallery - or you can choose to exclude images that you don't need displayed. It's a great way to show big, beautiful images! [gallery columns="4" itemtag="div" icontag="span" captiontag="p" link="file"]

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment.To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Share your experiences
item.dc:creator: chrisford
item.content:encoded:
Focus on words

You don't have to use a gallery in Family Tree—you can just as easily showcase regular old blog posts with images. You can even decide what layout to use for each individual post—choose from six different options!
